content: /]ABOUT THE CAMPAIGNPrivacy is an inherent human right, and a requirement for maintaining the human condition with dignity and respect. /][banned mixer] is a bitcoin mixing service that allow you stay anonymous! The management planned to conduct their signature campaign on Bitcointalk forum. As the campaign manager I confirm that, at the time of the launch of this campaign I hold 0.5 btc (â‰ˆ $18,000) in escrow to ensure payment for campaign members.Being a part of the campaign you are encouraged to engage in discussions on their from Official ANN thread. CAMPAIGN REWARDS Legendary payroll: $10.00 per post, maximum $250 per weekHero payroll: $8.00 per post, maximum $200 per weekSr. Member payroll: $6.00 per post, maximum $150 per week..NOTE :.. Spam / Low quality post - will not be paid.AI written contents will not be paid.CAMPAIGN RULESâ–¶ï¸ Wear the appropriate signature, avatar and personal text during the campaign.â–¶ï¸ No minimum per week, no local board limitation, maximum 25 posts will be considered per week to be paid.â–¶ï¸ Your spot will be occupied if you are not active for any reason. â–¶ï¸ Posts in the following boards/sections are not eligible: "Off-Topic", "Archival, Games & Rounds", "Investor-Based Games", "Wall Observers", "Serious Discussion", "Altcoin Discussion", "Lending", "Press", "Politics & Society", other signature campaign threads including this one, any Altcoin and Bounty ANN threads and areas where the signature is not visibleâ–¶ï¸ No valid negative from DT network unless prior approved by meâ–¶ï¸ Multi-account (alts) can apply but will need to give up all except only one if more than one is accepted. Failed to do so will result a negative feedback.â–¶ï¸ You must have minimum 50 merits in the last 120 daysâ–¶ï¸ Join my Telegram group (optional): https://t.me/R7BountyQAIMPORTANT INFORMATIONâ–¶ï¸ You are not allowed to change anything on the signature code. If you edit the signature code, I will disqualify you immediatelyâ–¶ï¸ I reserve the full right to add/remove any participants, push/cancel/reopen the campaign, or edit any rules of this campaignâ–¶ï¸ The week starts on Thursday and ends on Wednesday (UTC)â–¶ï¸ Please check the spreadsheet comment column and your payment information regularly.HOW TO APPLYReply to this thread with the following informationCode: Forum rank:Â 1st choice of interested payroll: Â Â 2nd choice of interested payroll:Â Merit earned in the last 120 days:Â Bech32 address:..SPREADSHEET..PERSONAL TEXTYour Privacy MattersAVATAR AND SIGNATURE SEThttps://i.ibb.co/Tt0vqp9/Tumbler-io.pngHERO/LEGENDARYCode:[center][table][tr][td][font=Arial black][size=25pt][glow=#112,1][color=#112]...[/color][url=https://[banned mixer]/][color=#fff]Tumbler[/color][color=#37d].io[/color][/url][color=#112]......[/color][font=Arial][size=20pt][color=#fff]Because[color=transparent].[/color]Your[color=transparent].[/color][u]Privacy[color=transparent].[/color]Matters[/u][/color][/size][/font][color=#112]......[/color][url=https://[banned mixer]/][color=#fff]Bitcoin[/color][color=transparent].[/color][color=#37d]Mixer[/color][/url][color=#112]...[/color][/glow][/size][/font][/td][/tr][/table][/center]SR. While we strive to promote these startups in the best possible light, our views and opinions expressed in our advertising materials do not necessarily reflect those of the startups themselves. We work with various clients across the crypto industry, and our goal is to provide high-quality advertising services to help them achieve their marketing objectives.Payment Disclaimer: Please always check the escrow wallet (if available). If the escrow wallet does not have enough balance and you think you have risk not to get paid then discontinue from the campaign. We are not liable to pay you anything that is not available on the escrow wallet.
